help.howTo1: This app is used to manage the ODP-Store. Here you can receive your orders, keep your product catalog up to date and publish your 'Customer Order App'.
help.howTo2: Each of these features can be accessed through the side menu in the left corner.
help.step1end: option on the side menu and register your product catalog with images, prices and options.
help.step2end: to publish your customer order application. Choose 'generate and publish'.
help.step3: Share your newly generated customer ordering app link to your customers, point your domain to it and receive their orders in the
help.title: Welcome to Open Delivery Platform

This software still in development, may have bugs or errors, may be feature incomplete, and may be subject

            Please use it at your own risk.
help.warningReport: Please report any bugs or issues to our github repository.
